channel.title: Comments on: Kuri’s got a new trick for pets
channel.description: Meet Kuri, the adorable home robot.

item.title: By: Jennifer Bakos
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Bakos
item.description: Will do, Paul! Thanks for sharing that great feedback with us.
item.content:encoded: Will do, Paul! Thanks for sharing that great feedback with us.

item.title: By: paul dimino
item.dc:creator: paul dimino
item.description: i cannot wait to get my robot,i am an early backer and i am really stoked to hear you upgraded his wheels to treads,i love hearing how he is progressing and have not been this excited about something in a long time,keep up the great work
item.content:encoded: i cannot wait to get my robot,i am an early backer and i am really stoked to hear you upgraded his wheels to treads,i love hearing how he is progressing and have not been this excited about something in a long time,keep up the great work
